channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump breaks his own record for the longest government shutdown in history
item.description: Data: House of Representatives ; Chart: Axios Visuals The U.S. is officially in its longest-ever government shutdown as of Wednesday — surpassing a mi...

item.title: Tesla flying car? Elon Musk teases "unforgettable" demo
item.description: Elon Musk is hinting that Tesla will soon showcase a flying car — possibly "before the end of the year." Why it matters: A flying car would combine tw...

item.title: Scoop: Trump's $2 billion fundraising binge
item.description: President Trump has raised about $1.9 billion from an array of corporate donors to help finance his political committees, White House construction pro...

item.title: America's military might bears down on Venezuela
item.description: Incredible amounts of U.S. firepower are coalescing in the Caribbean as President Trump plays geopolitical chicken with Venezuelan dictator Nicolás Ma...

item.title: A big blue wave for Democrats, and two paths forward
item.description: Democrats delivered a resounding rebuke to President Trump in all five of the most-watched races in Tuesday's elections, as voters responded to candid...

item.title: Winners and losers from the 2025 election
item.description: It was not a good night for Trump or Republicans aligned with him.

item.title: New York, city of immigrants, scores another first — a Muslim mayor
item.description: His opponents seized on Islamophobic attacks in the final weeks of the campaign. But Muslim Americans say his perseverance has given them newfound hop...

item.title: After strong election, Democrats now face battle over who defines party
item.description: The GOP is eager to name Mamdani the leader of the Democratic Party. Many Democrats say Spanberger and Sherrill are more representative.

item.title: Mamdani is elected mayor of New York. Here are his next hurdles.
item.description: The 34-year-old built a diverse coalition including young and disaffected voters, but his lack of governing experience could be a challenge.

item.title: A Muslim mayor, a female governor and other notable election ‘firsts’
item.description: The first Muslim woman to hold statewide office in the U.S. and Detroit’s first female mayor join Zohran Mamdani and Abigail Spanberger in trailblazin...

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
